description: For a given model:- download and cache all the shards of a sharded checkpoint if pretrained_model_name_or_path is a model ID on theHubreturns the list of paths to all the shards, as well as some metadata.For the description of each arg, see [PretrainedModel.from_pretrained]. index_filename is the full path to theindex (downloaded and cached if pretrained_model_name_or_path is a model ID on the Hub).
